messageBody:
Hi Thomas,

Thanks for the code snippet to chew on. I take it RuleFiles is an
array of filenames and those files have values that
testCreatingRuleFromFile() reads and performs a unique test?

I wasn't actually thinking of parameterizing a test method this way
but more along the lines of having TestSetup collect system info and
then having that available for the test methods. It would be done
once for the whole suite and wouldn't have to be included in the
TestCase. It seems silly to have to dump this info out to a file in
order for the tests to get at it but I don't see how else to do it.

thanks for the help,
-Kevin
